column5: The big fish moved out today. Only found the small ones that I can lip. Never caught such a small carp in my life ever. I'm used to the 17+.
haha congrats on smallest carp, ur well on ur way to the record books, nice tho, the second carp looks like decent size
i'll show you what's a small carp when i get home
I think it looks big because its close up shot. ha ha
aha so thats ur secret for making fish look bigger than they actaully are lol
such a nice little one! at least the big girls are still putting out!
Nice fish there dsn.  Not your usual big beasts but fun to catch I'm sure.  007
Hey Vic wheres that small carp?  dsn
Here's one of my smaller ones.  It's about the same length as a Kleenex box.  It's the smallest mirror I've ever caught.

i forgot about it when i got home last night lol ... now you'll have to wait till tonight  just for reference ... i think alot of the crappie caught at the opener this weekend will be bigger than my carp haha
